code: import{serverRequest}from'../../CommonServiceRequest/serverRequest';export function productCountAPI(udid){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('GET',"/product/count?udid=".concat(udid)).then(function(countRes){return countRes;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}export function loadProductAPI(parameter){return serverRequest.clientServiceRequest('GET',"/Product/Records?pageNumber=".concat(parameter.pageNumber,"&pageSize=").concat(parameter.PageSize,"&WarehouseId=").concat(parameter.WarehouseId,"}")).then(function(countRes){return countRes;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}
